about_the_game:
Grab and Guts is a thrilling shooter that takes you on an extraordinary journey with JuraPis through the human body, microscopic worlds, and other unimaginable realms. Armed with a grappling hook, you'll navigate intricate pathways, enter vital openings, and collect powerful weapons. Your mission is to punish the dreadful parasites—disgusting flies that thrive on living beings—and make them understand their place is in the grave. As a representative of the living world, it's up to you to cleanse these infested worlds and restore balance



Key Features:
  • Unique Environments: Explore the human body, microscopic realms, and beyond.
  • Grappling Hook Mechanics: Use your grappling hook to navigate complex paths and reach essential areas.
  • Weapon Collection: Gather a variety of weapons to combat the parasitic invaders.
  • Challenging Enemies: Face off against parasitic flies and other grotesque creatures.
  • Heroic Mission: Embark on a quest to protect and cleanse the living world from parasitic threats.
detailed_description:
Grab and Guts is a thrilling shooter that takes you on an extraordinary journey with JuraPis through the human body, microscopic worlds, and other unimaginable realms. Armed with a grappling hook, you'll navigate intricate pathways, enter vital openings, and collect powerful weapons. Your mission is to punish the dreadful parasites—disgusting flies that thrive on living beings—and make them understand their place is in the grave. As a representative of the living world, it's up to you to cleanse these infested worlds and restore balance



Key Features:
  • Unique Environments: Explore the human body, microscopic realms, and beyond.
  • Grappling Hook Mechanics: Use your grappling hook to navigate complex paths and reach essential areas.
  • Weapon Collection: Gather a variety of weapons to combat the parasitic invaders.
  • Challenging Enemies: Face off against parasitic flies and other grotesque creatures.
  • Heroic Mission: Embark on a quest to protect and cleanse the living world from parasitic threats.
name: Grab and Guts

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Grab and Guts - Shooter about JuraPis' journey through the human body, microscopic world, and unimaginable liquids and corners of light. Use your grappling hook to navigate, gather weapons, and eliminate parasitic enemies.
supported_languages:
